document.full_text: some say the bulls are too young and untested to win the title, but with tom thibodeau as coach, all the team has done so far in 2011 is win.
document.title: chicago news cooperative | sports: with or without stars, the bulls may go far
lines_and_colors: some say the bulls are too young and untested to win the title, but with tom thibodeau as coach, all the team has done so far in 2011 is win.
